children.text: Zora Neale Hurston's WPA field recordings in Jacksonville, FL made for the Library of Congress on June 18, 1939 with Herbert Halpert.

citation: WPA field recordings in Jacksonville (1939 recording expedition: Herbert Halpert). 1939-06-18. State Archives of Florida, Florida Memory. Accessed 31 Aug. 2024.<https://www.floridamemory.com/items/show/238024>
